short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A way to export pages as a simple txt file.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: With one quick click, you can export the visible text on your current page into a neat, tidy .txt file. No more messy copy-pastes. Just load the page, scroll to the top, hit export, and a .txt file will download instantly.
